item.title: Meetup - Monday 16th Septemeber 2019 at The ODI Node in Leeds
item.description: As the nights draw closer and autumn arrives it can only mean one thing, it’s time for an evening of DevOps frivolity, on Monday 16th September 2019 we are at the ODI Node in Leeds for an evening of devops wisdom. 6:45 - 7:15 : Doors open, have a chat, make some new devops friends 7:15 - 7:25 : Group updates/news/announcements 7:25 - 8:05 : DevOps and Monitoring/Metrics 8:05 - 8:20 : Intermission 8:20 - 9:00 : Beyond the Spotify Model - Team Topologies 9:00 - late : Social Our first speaker of the evening is James Healey, from Carbon DMP, talking about DevOps and Monitoring/Metrics.
